name: kill-the-newsletter
description: Kill the Newsletter is a tiny web app that turns email newsletters into Atom feeds. Users create unique addresses, subscribe to newsletters with them, then read issues in an RSS reader instead of their inbox.
features: Email to RSS: Convert email newsletters into Atom/RSS feeds automatically. Read newsletters in your RSS reader.
Unique Addresses: Generate unique email addresses for each newsletter subscription. Organize subscriptions separately.
Instant Setup: No registration required, start using immediately. Create feeds in seconds.
Atom Feed Output: Standard Atom feed format compatible with all RSS readers. Use your preferred reading app.
Inbox Declutter: Keep newsletters out of your email inbox entirely. Separate reading from email.
Privacy Focused: No tracking, no accounts, minimal data collection. Anonymous newsletter reading.
Lightweight: Minimal resource usage with simple, efficient design. Run on modest hardware.
Permanent Feeds: Feed URLs remain stable for long-term subscriptions. Reliable newsletter access.
HTML Content: Preserve newsletter formatting and images in feed entries. Read as intended by publishers.
Self-Hosted: Run your own instance for complete control and privacy. Own your newsletter infrastructure.
